pages.text: $(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/common_augments#feline)Feline: $()Wards off nearby creepers.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/common_augments#immunity)Immunity: $()The user is immune from negative effects.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/common_augments#lucky)Lucky: $()Grants the user Luck.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/common_augments#moonlit)Moonlit: $()The user gains Strength and Resistance during the night time.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/common_augments#suntouched)Suntouched: $()The user gains Strength and Speed during the day time.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/totem_augments#angelic)Angelic: $()$(l)$(4)(Active, Drains durability)$() Enables creative flight when totem is used.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/totem_augments#escape)Escape: $()$(l)$(4)(Active, 3 Uses)$() Using the totem teleports the totem-holder to the surface.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/totem_augments#guardian)Guardian: $()$(l)$(1)(Passive, 1 Use)$() When you health is low, summons a Crystalline Golem as aid.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/totem_augments#hasting)Hasting: $()$(l)$(1)(Passive, Drains durability)$() Grants the totem-holder Haste.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/totem_augments#soul_of_the_conduit)Soul of the Conduit: $()$(l)$(4)(Active, Drains durability)$() Grants the totem-holder Conduit Power while in water.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/totem_augments#soulbinding)Soulbinding: $()$(l)$(1)(Passive)$() Inventory is not lost upon death.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/totem_augments#strength)Strength: $()$(l)$(4)(Active, Drains durability)$() Grants the totem-holder Strength.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/totem_augments#undying)Undying: $()$(l)$(1)(Passive, 1 Use)$() Ressurects the player upon death and grants them temporary protection.$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/jewelry_augments#draconic_vision)Draconic Vision: $()Locate nearby ores with the vision of a dragon!$(br)$(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_augments/jewelry_augments#friendly)Friendly: $()Endermen and piglins will not bother the
